--- select_literals_paren_with_operator.sql
SELECT (1+1)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.ParenExpr{
          Lparen: 7,
          Rparen: 11,
          Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
            Op: "+",
            Left: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 8,
              ValueEnd: 9,
              Base: 10,
              Value: "1",
            },
            Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 10,
              ValueEnd: 11,
              Base: 10,
              Value: "1",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT (1 + 1)
